item.title: $3 Million On The Line—Will Jade Pay?
item.description: Tension rises as a $3 million jade deal hangs in the balance — will the payment go through or fall apart?

media:content.media:title: $3 Million On The Line—Will Jade Pay?
media:content.media:description: Tension rises as a $3 million jade deal hangs in the balance — will the payment go through or fall apart?

item.title: Turning A Van Into Race Headquarters!
item.description: Watch the creative process as a simple van is converted into a fully equipped race headquarters — built for speed and strategy.

item.title: This Ship Used To Be A German Engineering Masterpiece!
item.description: This Ship Used To Be A German Engineering Masterpiece! #wwI #germany #ship

item.title: This Spot Might Not Be Good For The Drill!
item.description: The team examines a potential jade site but faces concerns about its suitability — careful planning is key before drilling.

item.title: This Will Be Their New Home!
item.description: See the transformation as this classic van gets ready for its next chapter — blending vintage charm with modern updates.

item.title: Movie Company Damaged Ted's Car!
item.description: A movie production accidentally damages Ted’s car — highlighting the unexpected challenges of filming with vehicles.

item.title: This B-100 Is A Beautiful Truck!
item.description: Take a closer look at the B-100 — a beautifully designed truck that combines classic style with practical features.

item.title: Ted's Personal Car Collection Is Fantastic!
item.description: Take a look at Ted’s stunning lineup of classic cars, including a beautiful Rolls-Royce — elegance and history on display.

item.title: The Tank Of The Motorcycle Doesn't Look Original!
item.description: A closer look at a vintage motorcycle reveals a tank that may not be original — exploring design, restoration, and authenticity.

item.title: Chinese Investors Show Up Out Of Nowhere!
item.description: Chinese investors arrive unexpectedly at the jade site, bringing excitement and a chance to impress with the team’s efforts.

item.title: Would You Risk It All For A Perfect Jade Cut?
item.description: Miners face a high-stakes moment as they work to achieve the perfect jade cut — precision and pressure meet in the search for value.

item.title: Is This The Plane They've Been Looking For?
item.description: Excitement builds as the team spots a plane that could be the perfect fit — a closer look at aviation and careful selection.

item.title: Things Escalated Quickly!
item.description: A routine repossession takes an unexpected turn — showing the challenges and quick decisions faced on the job.

item.title: He Will Get His First Chance To Sit On The Engineer's Seat!
item.description: Excitement builds as he gets his first opportunity to sit in the engineer’s seat — experiencing aviation up close and hands-on.

item.title: They Have Been Working On This Show For 12 Months!
item.description: After 12 months of preparation, the team in Germany finally brings their competition show to life — dedication meets excitement on stage.

item.title: Things Look Promising! Is It Going To Be Jade?
item.description: The crew spots something exciting in the rock — could it be jade? Hope and hard work drive the search forward.

item.title: There's A Repo Order For His Mercedes!
item.description: A repossession team is sent to recover a Mercedes — a look at how the process unfolds with care and professionalism.

item.title: There Is A Rust Issue With The Engine! No Good!
item.description: A mechanic uncovers rust issues inside the engine — a closer look at how corrosion can impact performance and repairs.

item.title: This Car Is So Fun And Unique!
item.description: Take a closer look at a car that stands out for its creative design and playful features — a true treat for car enthusiasts!

item.title: Nightmare Pit Turns Into Pay Dirt!
item.description: What started as a tough mining day turns around when the crew strikes valuable jade — persistence pays off in the end.
